trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder et sett med metoder for å identifisere arvede komponenter.

trans-unit.source: The InheritanceService can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.
trans-unit.target: InheritanceService kan brukes til å finne arvede komponenter, Velg hvilke du vil ignorere og hente attributtet arv for hver arvede klassen som spores av tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til komponentene arvet av den angitte komponenten til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker i alle felt for alle basisklassene for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt som implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>legges til i den angitte beholderen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten til å søke etter arvet komponenter for å legge til den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen å legge til arvede komponentene.

trans-unit.source: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Legger til komponentene i den angitte typen som overføres til den angitte komponenten til den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden søker i alle felt for alle basisklassene av komponenten.

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component.
trans-unit.target: Hvert felt som implementerer <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>er lagt til en intern listen med en <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>som identifiserer arv-nivået for komponenten.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component is then added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten legges deretter til den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The base type to search for.
trans-unit.target: Basistypen til å søke etter.

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten til å søke etter arvet komponenter for å legge til den angitte beholderen.

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: Beholderen å legge til arvede komponentene.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Kaller avhending tillater ressursene som brukes av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>til tildeles på nytt til andre formål.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om avhending [Rydder opp uforvaltede ressurser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref> og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles av offentlig `Dispose()`metoden og <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metode.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`Aktiverer den beskyttede `Dispose(Boolean)` metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>aktiverer `Dispose` med `disposing` satt til `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references.
trans-unit.target: Når den `disposing` -parameteren er SANN, denne metoden Frigjør alle ressurser holdes av administrerte objekter som denne <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>referanser.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden starter den `Dispose()` metode for hver referert objekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Henter attributtet arv for den angitte komponenten.

trans-unit.source: If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis komponenten ikke er overført, returnerer denne metoden verdien <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, returneres arv-attributtet for denne komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
trans-unit.target: Komponenten til å hente arv-attributtet for.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref> som beskriver krypteringsnivået arv denne komponenten kommer fra.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
trans-unit.target: Angir om skal ignoreres i det angitte medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The member to check.
trans-unit.target: Medlemmet kontroller.

trans-unit.source: This member is either a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> or a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er enten en <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>eller <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> </xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: The component instance this member is bound to.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er bundet til komponentforekomsten.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis det angitte medlemmet som skal inkluderes i settet med arvede komponenter. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
